/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is flanked by lush green trees on both sides, their leaves forming a verdant canopy overhead. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding to the overall brightness of the scene.

On the right side of the street, there's a construction site, marked by a red and white striped barrier, indicating ongoing work. A few construction vehicles are parked nearby, ready for action. On the left side of the street, a traffic light stands tall, guiding the flow of vehicles and pedestrians. A few cars and trucks can be seen on the road, going about their daily routines.

The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and the buildings in the distance. This perspective also gives a sense of being in the midst of the action, as if you're standing right there on the street, looking towards the horizon. The image is a snapshot of life in Beijing, capturing the city's vibrant energy and dynamic urban landscape.
